articles.description: The Queen, 95, was due to visit the Halcyon Days factory in Staffordshire in 2020 to mark its own Platinum Jubilee of 70 years, but plans were put on hold when the pandemic struck.
articles.content: The Queen was all smiles as she stood with her walking stick at an official engagement at her Windsor Castle home this week after it was revealed she hopes to attend a thanksgiving service to remembe… [+13050 chars]
